maqras.text: Did We not delight/expand your chest (innermost)
And We raised from you your sin/load/burden
Which weighed heavily (on)/burdened your back
And We raised for you your memory/reputation
So that truly with the difficulty/hardship (is) ease/flexibility
That truly with the difficulty/hardship (is) ease/flexibility
So when/if you finished/ended/completed , so work hard/fatigue
And to your Lord, so wish/desire
And/by the figs and the olives
And/by Seneen Mountain
And/by this the country/land/city , the faithful/secure
We had (E) created the human/mankind in best chronometry/cartography (methods of calculating maps and charts)/straightness (formation)
Then We returned him (to) lowest/more lowly/more mean lowly/mean (lowliest)
Except those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, so for them (is) a not interrupted/weakened reward
So what makes you lie/deny/falsify after with the religion
Is God not with (the) most judicious (of) the judges/rulers
Read by your Lord`s name who created
He created the human/mankind from blood clots/sperm
Read and/by your Lord, the most honoured/generous
Who taught/instructed by the pen/writing utensil
He taught/instructed the human/mankind what he did not know
No but that truly the human/mankind tyrannizes/exceeds the limit (E)
That (E) he saw/understood him(self), he enriched/sufficed (himself)
That truly to your Lord (is) the return
Did you see/understand who forbids/prevents
A worshipper/servant/slave when/if he prayed
Did you see/understand if he was on the guidance
Or he ordered/commanded with the fear and obedience of God
Did you see/understand if he lied/denied/falsified and he turned away
Does he not know with that (E) God sees/understands
No but if (E) he does not end/terminate/stop, We will pull and strike (E) by the forehead/forehead`s hair
A lying/denying/falsifying, sinning/erring/wronging forehead/forehead`s hair
So he should call his caller
We will call the strong ones/patrol force/Elzabaneya angels
No but do not obey him, and prostrate and near/approach (to Me)
We (E) descended it in the predestined/destiny night
And what made you know/informed you what the predestined/destiny night (is)
The predestined/destiny night (is) better than one thousand month (lunar months)
The angels descend and the Soul/Spirit in it, by their Lord`s permission/pardon from every matter/affair
Security/peace it is until the dawn`s ascent/rising
Those who disbelieved from the Book`s people and the sharers/takers of partners (with God) were not broken to pieces/separated until the evidence comes to them
A messenger from God, he reads/recites/follows purified/cleaned written pages (scriptures)
In it (are) straight/valuable Books
And those who were given/brought the Book did not separate except from after what came to them (from) the evidence

And they were not ordered/commanded except to worship God faithful/loyal/devoted to Him (in) the religion (as) submitters/Unifiers of God , and they keep up the prayers, and they give/bring the charity/purification , and that (is) the straight/valuable religion
That truly those who disbelieved from the Book`s people and the sharers/takers of partners (with God are) in Hell`s fire immortally/eternally in it, those, they are the creation`s worst
That truly those who believed and made/did the correct/righteous deeds, those, they are the creation`s best

Their reimbursement (is) at their Lord, treed gardens/paradises (as) eternal residence the rivers/waterways flow from beneath it, immortally/eternally in it (for) ever (E), God accepted/approved on them, and they accepted/approved on Him, that (is) to who feared his Lord
When/if the earth/Planet Earth shook/trembled its shaking/trembling/earthquake
And the earth/Planet Earth brought out its loads/weights
And the human/mankind said: "What (is) for it (what is wrong with it)
That day it tells/informs (about) its news/information/knowledge
With that your Lord inspired/transmitted to it
That day, the people proceed/arise separately to see their deeds
So who makes/does a smallest particle of anything (smaller than an atom`s) weight (of) good sees it
And who makes/does a smallest particle of anything (smaller than an atom`s) weight (of) bad/evil sees it
And/by the panting/changing colour , attacking forces/horses
So the igniters (of fire)/swayers , fire striking/sparking/decaying
So the raiders/fast attacking horses (in) mornings/daybreaks
So they stirred and arose/agitated dust/splashing mud or water with it
So they were in the middle with it all together/(in) a group
That truly the human/mankind (is) ungrateful/disobedient (E) to his Lord
And he truly (is) on that witnessing/testifying (E)
And that he truly to the good`s/wealth`s love/like (is) strong (intense) (E) (humans love excessive goodness)
